original_title: パンツァードラグーン
overview: The brave Kyle and blind Alita were hunting creatures one day, when a large black dragon ambushed them, stealing the beautiful Alita away and killing their companion. Now, joined by a mysterious blue dragon hell-bent on helping to thwart the evil beast, Kyle races against the clock to stop the duo from reaching the black tower -- before it's too late!
tagline: Legend meets Destiny on the wings of dragons!
title: Panzer Dragoon
